page.title: 01MILLICHOPE ESTATE
page.content: This block is almost all on Millichope Estate excepting New House Farm and Castle Moor. It extends from Hope Dale up over View Edge down to the river Corm & Trow brook, then across Balaam's Heath. Millichope Hall with its ornamental lakes are set in extensive parkland. Large estate woodland (deciduous and coniferous) covers the steeper slopes. The Norman-built Forester's Lodge is today part of the farmhouse at Millichope. The hamlets of Broadstone, Hungerford, Beambridge and upper Millichope
